Welcome to The Cursed Scrolls

¿What is The Cursed Scrolls?

The Cursed Scrolls is the impractical library that you need for your scrolls.

✔ Insert a gif in the scrollbar

✔ Unncecessarily rotate the text everytime you scroll

✔ or change its size

✔ or move its content

✔ Make your scroll size unnecessarily big

And a lot more pointless features...




Example 1: Gif

new Scroll({
  elemId: "scroll1",
  gifUrl: "https://i.gifer.com/8vGN.gif"
});

Cursed gif scroll

Example 2: Translation

new Scroll({   elemId: "scroll2",
  events: [
     { type: "margin-top", speed: 10 },
     { type: "margin-left", speed: 10 }
  ],
});

Cursed moving scroll


Example 3: Rotation

new Scroll({
   elemId: "scroll10",
   events: [{type:"transform", speed:5}]
});

Cursed rotation scroll


Example 4: Size

new Scroll({    elemId: "scroll3",
   height: 80000,
   events: [
     { type: "width", speed: -2 },
     { type: "height", speed: -5 },
     { type: "margin-left", speed: 5 }
   ] });

Cursed size scroll


Example 5: Infinite

new Scroll({
   elemId: "scroll4",
   text: ["", ""],
   changeText: [0, 1],
});

Cursed never ending scroll
